r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.9M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Vaisala Canada. The average
  contract duration was 0.8 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $268.3K. The longest
  contract was 6.82 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.3M.
lookup_name: 'VAISALA CANADA'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.9M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '57'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '8'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '14%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '183%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.62'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '3.9M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.8'
s421_mean_contract_value: '268.3K'
s425_max_duration: '6.82'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.3M'
